title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Drift and Drag Races
content:
Enjoy the thrill of controlled chaos in Drift and Drag Races, which exemplify the yin and the yang of high-octane racing in GTA Online, with the monetary incentives to match. Both Drift Races and Drag Races will be paying out Double Rewards through March 6.

Drift and Drag Races are accessible by talking to the Race Organizer inside the LS Car Meet or through your iFruit with an eligible LS Car Meet Membership.
